dmca.title: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at [66.98.243.53] Case Number: 11458
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 01, 2007 8:01 AM
To: DMCA Houston
Subject: RE: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[66.98.243.53] Case Number: 11458

 

EV1Servers.net,

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter.  I have rechecked
www.bestbuypcs.com <http://www.bestbuypcs.com/>  and found they are
still in violation of LG's intellectual property.  I have pasted all
infringing URL's below to better assist in reaching compliance.  Please
notify me at Bdavis@netenforcers.com once all changes have been made so
I can close the case.

 

Copyright

 

http://www.bestbuypcs.com/store/ccp51/cp-app.cgi?usr=51G8244361&rnd=1102
209&rrc=N&affl=&cip=70.164.72.77&act=&aff=&pg=prod&ref=7049&cat=SUB191&c
atstr=

209&rrc=N&affl=&cip=70.164.72.77&act=&aff=&pg=prod&ref=2356&cat=SUB191&c
atstr=

atstr=

 

 

Thank you,

 

Barbara Davis

LMS Manager

Net Enforcers Inc.

BDavis@netenforcers.com  
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......

Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.

 

-----Original Message-----
From: dmca@ev1servers.net [mailto:dmca@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2007 5:19 PM
To: Barbara Davis
Subject: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at [66.98.243.53]
Case Number: 11458

 

Your Reference Number: 

Our Case Number: 11458

 

 

, , . 

 

Sir, 

 

We feel that the user in question in this violation has successfully
removed the material in question regarding the abuse complaint and have
closed the case in our records, as of 4/30/2007 4:18:40 PM. 

 

The offending URL(S) was:  http://www.bestbuypcs.com.   Referencing
11458

 

-- 

 

Regards,

Legal Department

EV1Servers.net
